title: (x) Modern script and simple sans - FF Scala Sans, MeMimas {Florian}
content:
Hi

I'd like to know both of these please, I've seen some similar fonts before but not quite the same.

Thanks very much

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [c4b079d41fccacdd8fd39f82a129e12c4d40e9e7\_m.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110119051441/http:/typophile.com/files/c4b079d41fccacdd8fd39f82a129e12c4d40e9e7_m.jpg) | 45.62 KB |
author: mrjono

comments.content:
Hi Jono,

that’s [Martin Majoor](http://web.archive.org/web/20110119051441/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Martin%20Majoor)’s [Scala Sans (SC?)](http://web.archive.org/web/20110119051441/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?&q=scala&x=0&y=0&sample_text=ECORGANIC%20BABY%20%26%20CHILD&sample_size=32) and Type-Ø-Tones’ [MeMimas](http://web.archive.org/web/20110119051441/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/typeotones/memimas_bold/?&sample_text=estille%20%26%20thild&sample_size=48).  
F

Hi Florian,

Thanks as always, you really know your stuff!
